overview.title: Overview of GroupDocs.Merger for Python
overview.description: A versatile API for merging, splitting, rearranging, and refining documents, slides, and diagrams in Python applications.

feature_1.title: Merge documents with ease in Python
feature_1.description: Effortlessly combine PDF and Office documents into a single file using GroupDocs.Merger for Python. With extensive format support, this library ensures seamless integration and merging of various file types, simplifying document management in Python applications.

feature_2.title: Simplify document handling by segmenting large files
feature_2.description: Easily split large PDF or Office files into smaller, more manageable sections with GroupDocs.Merger for Python. Customize your documents by dividing them based on specific pages, ranges, or extracting individual pages, improving organization and workflow efficiency.

feature_3.title: Gain full control over your document's structure in Python
feature_3.description: Easily rearrange, swap, or remove pages to customize your document layout using GroupDocs.Merger for Python. Adapt your files to meet specific requirements, offering unmatched flexibility in creating tailored document structures.
